name: The Runner (Rodrigo Antunes)
description:
Using just two buttons to move your motocycle!
This game was created for Strawnberry JAM using the THEME: TWO BUTTONS

This is a test and minigame using Phaser with PhaserEditor2D, using to training javascript in games.

  • Background movement
  • physics movement 
  • fall objects
  •  collisions
  •  sounds

The video about this project will be uploaded on my channel!

Portuguese : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU1NmAQpyrxhyAxNVjkohYQ?view_as=subscriber

English: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_j9j48jN3U0jARrMVSOYFA?view_as=subscriber

Thank you so much!
